thread.title: adidas’ Stan Smith Boost Receives a Metallic Copper Upgrade
thread.title_full: adidas’ Stan Smith Boost Receives a Metallic Copper Upgrade

author: Marcus Cho
title: adidas’ Stan Smith Boost Receives a Metallic Copper Upgrade
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
adidas’ legendary Stan Smith silhouette has been receiving a variety of upgrades recently, namely in the form of collaborative efforts with several labels . Now, for spring 2017, the Stan Smith is receiving another new iteration in the form of a metallic copper variation, following up on the newly-unveiled heels of a metallic silver version. 
The new pair offers a glossy metallic copper upper, with what appears to be a premium leather sockliner to round out a luxury feel. The most striking detail appears on the midsole however, where the standard Stan Smith midsole has been replaced with a soft BOOST midsole typically prevalent only in newer silhouettes.
The new metallic pairs, including the aforementioned metallic silver pair, will be available in women’s sizes sometime this spring at select adidas retailers worldwide.
